title: ICE running cargo fix --edition-idioms

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
On both 1.32.0 and nightly, running `cargo fix --edition-idioms` on the unwind crate here ICEs: 

https://github.com/sfackler/rstack/tree/c0f66aa2443e8dc0070a7bc0759def45d4e01fa0
```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'src/librustc/hir/def.rs:257: attempted .def_id() on invalid def: NonMacroAttr(Builtin)', src/librustc/util/bug.rs:37:26
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
             at src/libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:39
   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:70
   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:58
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:200
   3: std::panicking::default_hook
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:215
   4: rustc::util::common::panic_hook
   5: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:482
   6: std::panicking::begin_panic
   7: rustc::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}}
   8: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_opt::{{closure}}
   9: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_context_opt
  10: rustc::ty::context::tls::with_opt
  11: rustc::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt
  12: rustc::util::bug::bug_fmt
  13: rustc::hir::def::Def::def_id::{{closure}}
  14: rustc::hir::def::Def::def_id
  15: rustc_resolve::build_reduced_graph::<impl rustc_resolve::Resolver<'a>>::populate_module_if_necessary
  16: rustc_resolve::build_reduced_graph::<impl rustc_resolve::Resolver<'a>>::build_reduced_graph_for_item
  17: <rustc_resolve::build_reduced_graph::BuildReducedGraphVisitor<'a, 'b> as syntax::visit::Visitor<'a>>::visit_item
  18: syntax::visit::walk_item
  19: <rustc_resolve::build_reduced_graph::BuildReducedGraphVisitor<'a, 'b> as syntax::visit::Visitor<'a>>::visit_item
  20: syntax::ext::expand::AstFragment::visit_with
  21: rustc_resolve::macros::<impl syntax::ext::base::Resolver for rustc_resolve::Resolver<'a>>::visit_ast_fragment_with_placeholders
  22: syntax::ext::expand::MacroExpander::collect_invocations
  23: syntax::ext::expand::MacroExpander::expand_fragment
  24: syntax::ext::expand::MacroExpander::expand_crate
  25: rustc_driver::driver::phase_2_configure_and_expand_inner::{{closure}}
  26: rustc::util::common::time
  27: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  28: <scoped_tls::ScopedKey<T>>::set
  29: rustc_driver::run_compiler
  30: <scoped_tls::ScopedKey<T>>::set
query stack during panic:
end of query stack

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.33.0-nightly (01f8e25b1 2019-01-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

error: Could not compile `rstack`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```
